com.whaleal.mars.gridfs

接口 ResourceLoader

  • 所有已知子接口:
    GridFsOperations, ResourcePatternResolver
    所有已知实现类:
    BaseMarsSesssion, DatastoreImpl, Mars, MarsSessionImpl

    public interface ResourceLoader

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX
      Pseudo URL prefix for loading from the class path: "classpath:".

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

      Resource getResource(String location)

    • 字段详细资料

      • CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX

        static final String CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX
        Pseudo URL prefix for loading from the class path: "classpath:".
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • getResource

        Resource getResource(String location)
        Return a Resource handle for the specified resource location.

        The handle should always be a reusable resource descriptor,

        • Must support fully qualified URLs, e.g. "file:C:/test.dat".
        • Must support classpath pseudo-URLs, e.g. "classpath:test.dat".
        • Should support relative file paths, e.g. "WEB-INF/test.dat". (This will be implementation-specific, typically provided by an ApplicationContext implementation.)

        Note that a Resource handle does not imply an existing resource;

        参数:
        location - the resource location
        返回:
        a corresponding Resource handle (never null)
        另请参阅:
        CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX

      • getClassLoader

        ClassLoader getClassLoader()
        Expose the ClassLoader used by this ResourceLoader.

        Clients which need to access the ClassLoader directly can do so in a uniform manner with the ResourceLoader, rather than relying on the thread context ClassLoader.

        返回:
        the ClassLoader (only null if even the system ClassLoader isn't accessible)
